title: The struggle of resizing windows on macOS Tahoe
author: happosai
aiHeadline: Resizing windows on macOS Tahoe is like trying to fit a square peg into a round hole... except it's even more frustrating.

title: I dumped Windows 11 for Linux, and you should too
author: smurda
aiHeadline: Why bother with Windows 11 when Linux is like a perfectly tuned orchestra? Because who needs a headache when you can have a smooth experience?

title: Don't fall into the anti-AI hype
author: todsacerdoti
aiHeadline: AI is going to take over the world? Please, it can't even figure out how to make a decent cup of coffee.

title: iCloud Photos Downloader
author: reconnecting
aiHeadline: Because who doesn't love paying Apple for the privilege of accessing their own photos? Now you can download them all at once!

title: Gentoo Linux 2025 Review
author: akhuettel
aiHeadline: If you enjoy spending hours compiling your system just to make it slightly faster, Gentoo Linux 2025 is your new best friend.
